item.description:
Conditions should be great at Windblown this Sunday. Windblown is the ultimate New England cross country ski experience with a wonderful lodge, bring your lunch or buy it there (I'm pretty sure they will have the cafe fully open but call to be sure if you are not bringing lunch.)

All abilities are welcome, we break up into groups based on experience and ability

We meet at 10 AM, just outside the lodge at the ski rack ready to ski. Arrive early so you can buy your trail pass and get ready to ski before we meet. Allow at least 1.5 hours driving time from the Boston area.

Trail passes are $16--CASH OR CHECK ONLY!!!
Rentals available

Contact each other for carpooling!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing the Santa hat...

group.name: The Boston Cross-Country Skiing and Snowshoe Meetup Group

item.name: Windblown Sunday
